caption.title: Soil temperatures averaged by treatment for each depth (5, 10, and 30 cm) during one freeze-thaw cycle in winter 2015 in the reference (left), warmed (center), and warmed + FTC treatment (right).
caption.p: We used soil temperatures at 10 cm depth (thickest line) to operationally define one soil FTC. Note that while the temperatures at 5 cm depth are higher than 10 cm depth in the reference plots, they are not significantly different from each other.
